          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Conduction and convection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übertragung und Konvektion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conduction et convection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Condução e convection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conduzione e convezione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διεξαγωγή και μεταφορά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conducción y convección</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows a laboratory setup that can be used to demonstrate heat conduction along a metal bar and heat convection in water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">boiling tube</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Bunsen burner</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">convection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper bar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cork</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wax</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt ein installiertes Labor, 
das benutzt werden kann, um Hitzeübertragung entlang einer 
Metallstab- und -hitzekonvektion im Wasser zu demonstrieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre un laboratoire installé qui 
peut être employé pour démontrer la conduction de la chaleur le 
long d'une convection de barre et de chaleur en métal dans l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra um laboratório setup que 
possa ser usado demonstrar a condução do calor ao longo de um 
convection da barra e do calor do metal na água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra un laboratorio installato 
che può essere usato per dimostrare la conduzione di calore lungo una
convezione della barra e di calore del metallo in acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει εργαστηριακή οργάνωση που
μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί για να καταδείξει τη διεξαγωγή 
θερμότητας κατά μήκος μιας μεταφοράς ράβδων και θερμότητας 
μετάλλων στο ύδωρ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra un laboratorio setup que se
pueda utilizar para demostrar la conducción del calor a lo largo de 
una convección de la barra y del calor del metal en agua.</string>
          </description>
